problems.title: Sum of Two Numbers
problems.Description: You are given two numbers a and b.You need to find the gcd of these two numbers.

problems.title: Maximum Subarray sum
problems.Description: You are given an array of size n having real integers. Find the maximum subarray sum possible

problems.title: Reverse an Integer
problems.Description: Given a signed 32-bit integer x, return x with its digits reversed. If reversing x causes the value to go outside the signed 32-bit integer range [-231, 231 - 1], then return 0.

problems.title: Regular Expression Matching
problems.Description: Given an input string s and a pattern p, implement regular expression matching with support for '.' and '*' where:'.', Matches any single character.​​​​'*' Matches zero or more of the preceding element.The matching should cover the entire input string (not partial).
